articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A hiker posted a  video showing the water flow of the fall was coming from a pipe built into the rock face.
articles.title: Yuntai: Hiker finds pipe feeding China's tallest waterfall

articles.description: Food prices, including a $40 chicken, has stoked fury and calls for big foreign supermarket chains to come to Canada.
articles.title: Why Canadians are angry with their biggest supermarket

articles.description: Hallie Biden gives testimony in his gun crimes trial, telling the court she got rid of the weapon as she feared for his safety.
articles.title: Hunter Biden trial: Hallie Biden 'panicked' on finding his gun

articles.description: Dr Mosley is on holiday on the Greek island and had failed to return from a hike.
articles.title: Michael Mosley: TV doctor missing on Greek island of Symi

articles.description: A US court has ordered ex-Trump campaign strategist Steve Bannon to turn himself in by 1 July.
articles.title: Steve Bannon: Ex-Trump aide ordered to prison

articles.description: Dozens of people are reported to have been killed in the strike which Israel says targeted Hamas.
articles.title: Gaza war: Witnesses tell of 'unimaginable' shelter air strike

articles.description: Scientists have found a weak spot in our DNA that is present in 95% of people with the disease.
articles.title: Major cause of inflammatory bowel disease found

articles.description: At least 35 people were reportedly killed in an Israeli strike on a UN school housing displaced people.
articles.title: US says Israel must be open over Gaza school strike

articles.description: Australian researchers were stunned to see the spiky, land-dwelling echidna emerge from a tiger shark.
articles.title: Tiger shark spotted regurgitating echidna in surprising world first
